caption.p: Inhibition of cellular viability of cancer cell lines by S. glaucus fractions. The cells were treated for 48â€‰h and cytotoxicity of S. glaucus fractions was estimated using the MTT assay. Data represents the mean of three independent experiments, with each carried out in triplicate. (a) SG-crude. (b) SG-hex. (c) SG-CHCL 3. (d) SG-BuOH.
